alert.note: Alert for Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; Central and South Weld County; Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet; Jefferson and West Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet, Gilpin, Clear Creek, Northeast Park Counties Below 9000 Feet; Logan County; Morgan County; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County; North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County; Northeast Weld County; Phillips County; Sedgwick County; Southeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, South Lincoln County; Washington County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 22 at 1:59PM MST until November 25 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER STORM ARRIVING THANKSGIVING EVENING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THURSDAY TO 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of central, east central, and northeast Colorado. * WHEN...From 8 PM Thursday to 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Roads will likely become slick and hazardous. The hazardous conditions will impact the Friday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: Roads will be slick resulting in slow and hazardous travel. Allow extra time to reach your destination.
